function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Spread of invasive mosquito species competent for arbovirus transmission, including zika and chikungunya","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Territorial expansion of aedes spp. incriminated as vectors for arboviruses and parasitic nematodes","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased local temperatures due to urbanization leading to higher incidence of mosquito-borne diseases such as dengue, zika, and yellow fever","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Climate-associated changes in precipitation disproportionately affecting urban and rural environments in terms of mosquito oviposition sites","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in estimating urban mosquito species distributions and abundance, leading to poor estimation of urban disease exposure","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global warming leading to an increased burden of mosquito-borne diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Globalization and increased international travel enabling the importation of invasive mosquito vectors and pathogens","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Temperature modifications influencing the epidemic potential of mosquito-borne diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in heat-related deaths due to hotter days and more frequent heatwaves","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and cardio-vascular disease due to particulate matter and wildfires","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Worsening of air quality and increase in airborne allergens leading to allergic diseases like asthma and rhino-conjunctivitis","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased urbanization leading to limited understanding of urban health and disparities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Creation of urban heat islands uhis due to greenhouse gas production and urbanization","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Local-scale variation in uhi intensity due to urban geometry","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Climate change leading to increased health burden","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of urban mosquito-borne diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Urbanization leading to higher environmental challenges for human health","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in global average temperature","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of impacts of climate change","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impacts of climate change on human health","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relocation of health care personnel hcp to new aiirs","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sharing devices and equipment among hcp","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison and publication of infection rates","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pressure differentials not maintained in aiirs","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unintended door opening in temporary aiirs","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate negative pressure in patient rooms and anterooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear guidelines for pressure differentials and air changes per hour","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance and monitoring of negative air machines","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious particles from isolation rooms into the corridor due to lack of anterooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective design and construction of anterooms leading to difficulty in using ppe and disinfecting medical devices","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate size of anterooms leading to insufficient space for health care workers to operate","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate number of aiirs airborne infection isolation rooms for severely affected covid-19 patients","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate room size and equipment for critical covid-19 patients requiring extracorporeal membrane oxygenation, mechanical ventilation, or continuous renal replacement therapy","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of anterooms for partitioning to create additional aiirs","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shortage of medical resources including medical personnel, medicine, and equipment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of airborne-infection isolation rooms aiirs for covid-19 patients","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for rapid expansion of aiir capacity to prevent infection spread to medical personnel and other patients","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient analysis or prediction of virus transmission risks at an architectural scale","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on post-evaluation of known outbreak cases for understanding virus transmission risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of complex human-building interactions and their impact on virus transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of viruses due to human interaction and movement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and visualization of virus contamination in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate visualization of virus transmission behaviors and impacts","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of longitudinal overview in 3d situated visualization","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effects of randomness in human behaviors not adequately addressed","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex simulation parameters overwhelming non-expert users","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitation in intuitive comparison of multiple simulation outputs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporating relationships between occupants’ behaviors and virus transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on existing data may lead to overestimation of simulation validity and not account for behavioral influences.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of detailed exploration of human-building interactions in simulation tools","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
